definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: A modern office building is standing on the site of the old bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 一座現代化辦公大樓矗立在這家書店的故址上。

sentences.english: Another office building was opened in 2001 as BOC Centre.
sentences.chinese: 另一新辦公大樓奧海中心於2001年改爲中銀中心。

sentences.english: The seismic assessment and strengthening design for the Chinese Embassy building in Samoa, done by IEE.
sentences.chinese: 教育部辦公大樓抗震鑑定與加固設計，由抗震所完成。

sentences.english: The scheme also extended into the Kamppi district with a series of tall office blocks.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃還擴展到辦公大樓坎目皮區高，有一系列。

sentences.english: We plan to repaint the upper floors of the office building.
sentences.chinese: 我們打算重新粉刷這幢辦公大樓的上面幾層樓。

sentences.english: A: That is our office block.
New apartment blocks and office towers are rising along the riverfront.
sentences.chinese: 新公寓住宅區和辦公大樓紛紛在河前聳立起來。

sentences.english: Their office building was a goodish distance from the subway station.
sentences.chinese: 他們的辦公大樓離地鐵站很長一段距離。

sentences.english: Office buildings are springing up by the north river bank.
sentences.chinese: 一座座的辦公大樓屹立在北江河邊。

sentences.english: We plan to repaint the upper floors of the office building.
sentences.chinese: 我們打算重新粉刷這棟辦公大樓的上面幾層樓。

sentences.english: Palatial office buildings are being constructed in the city.
sentences.chinese: 那個城市正在興建一些宮殿式辦公大樓。

sentences.english: This government building is sumptuously appointed.
sentences.chinese: 這座政府辦公大樓佈置得極爲豪華。

sentences.english: It is located at the west of Guoxing road.
sentences.chinese: 學校位於國興大道西側，毗鄰海南省政府新辦公大樓。

sentences.english: Man mistakes building for bank in holdup vienna austria-a man mistook a muni.
sentences.chinese: 奧地利劫匪錯將政府辦公大樓當銀行。

sentences.english: The office buildings were slightly zigzagged to fit available ground space.
sentences.chinese: 辦公大樓爲了配合可用的地皮建造得略呈之字形。

sentences.english: The building of homes should come before the building of new office blocks.
sentences.chinese: 建造住宅比建造辦公大樓更爲重要。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
